name: d2l-icons
description: SVG images, Polymer iron-iconset collections and SASS mixins for D2L icons

scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:iconsets
scripts.build:iconsets: node ./cli/create-iconset-cli images/tier1 images/tier2 images/tier3 images/html-editor images/emoji
scripts.galen:sauce:run: npm run galen -- test galen.sauce.config.js -i SAUCE_USERNAME SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG TRAVIS_JOB_NUMBER TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER -- -p4
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run build && npm run test:unit:local
scripts.test:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:sauce: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:sauce:run"

author: D2L Corporation
